Package org.gbif.dwc.text

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Archive
    A darwin core star archive allowing easy reading and iteration over a core record with all its extensions.
    ArchiveFactory  
    ArchiveField  
    ArchiveFile
    This class can be used to encapsulate information about a file contained within a Darwin Core Archive.
    DwcaWriter
    Simple writer class to create valid dwc archives using tab data files.
    MetaDescriptorWriter
    Utils class to write a meta.xml descriptor file.
    SimpleSaxHandler
    A simple metadata sax base handler that collects all character data inside elements into a string buffer, resetting the buffer with every element start and storing the string version of the buffer in this.content when the end of the element is reached.
    StarRecord  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArchiveField.DataType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MetadataException
    Exception indicating invalid or non existing metadata.
    UnkownCharsetException  
    UnkownDelimitersException  
    UnsupportedArchiveException
